responses.rationale: The segment describes an event factually without using high-potency verbs, metaphors, or other Q2 cues.
The segment describes actions taken ('shuttered aviaries') without using high-potency verbs, metaphors, or other Q2 cues.
The segment describes actions taken ('keeping their chickens in', 'trying to keep wild waterfowl out') without using high-potency verbs, metaphors, or other Q2 cues.
The segment uses the critical alert phrase 'on high alert'.
